ygData.subject: Stein of Moggok Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: First of all, I d like to wish everyone a Happy Easter. Have a question. I did the Stein Quest twice today. Cast Illusion:DE on my Lvl 14 Erudite Enchanter,
ygData.messageBody:
First of all, I'd like to wish everyone a Happy Easter.

Have a question. I did the Stein Quest twice today. Cast Illusion:DE
on my Lvl 14 Erudite Enchanter, and cast Alliance on Clurg. I conned
Clurg as Amiable both times. Both times I said "What special book",
he replied, and I gave him the compodium. Then he said something
like "You must have worked hard to get my book, I am indebted to you.
I don't like being indebted, so take this as payment". He didn't give
me anything; no PP, no stein. I petitioned the GM. Does anyone have a
clue as to what is going on?
